title: Ticket #627: gridmanager doesn't advertise to multiple collectors
description:
When sending ads to the collector, the gridmanager directly instantiates a DCCollector object and sends the ads using that. Consequently, if COLLECTOR_HOST is a list, the ads only go the first collector.

The gridmanager should use daemoncore's facilities for sending ads to the collector(s). It handles multiple collectors and inserts some additional attributes.
